showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be

showerReviews.reviewText: Honestly after seeing some negative comments on the showers, we were hesitant to stop at this location. Thankfully, we had a great experience! While the truck parking was completely full, we did get to snag a temporary parking area to come ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ NO HOT WATER IN SHOWERS ‚Ä¶

04-09-25
The store is in the process of renovating. New showers. Unfortunately, the cheap shower heads spoil so much efforts of renovating them.
Beaten up driveways. Outdated pump equipment, but always friendly customer service! ü§† ‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs a Love‚Äôs. Parking here can fill quickly. I usually park across the road at the road ranger and walk over to Love‚Äôs to use my free showers. There‚Äôs a sidewalk that connects the truck stops. It gets me a bit of exercise to walk briskly ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of loves workers are just lazy and that's sad because the bathrooms look updated. I come into my shower nothing but hair on the sink floor and toilet. It doesn't even require much to just wipe and sanitize things for the next person. ‚Ä¶

HOT SHOWER!! I stopped at Loves #345 store to fuel, and the pump didn't work. I left there and came to this one, and everything was great. I'm not sure how there can be such a difference between different stores within the same chain

‚Ä¶ are my favorite travel stop when I'm out on the road I can get everything I need here including a hot shower propane clean windows with windshield washer fluid available and the folks here are so nice so kind and very hospitable love ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Diamond status every month. Loves is the only truckstop I fuel at. Pulled into this one today to get a quick shower and grab something to eat before I fuel and hit the road. I parked across from the cat scale in an open spot between 2 ‚Ä¶
Worst shower experience I‚Äôve ever had at a love I didn‚Äôt get to enjoy my shower it was barely warm to take a shower literally no hot water don‚Äôt ask for shower 4

Friendly Staff, Clean Showers, Fuel Pumps were clean & not busy, and parking was not a problem. I arrived 03/30/18 at 1915 and was parked & in my shower by 1930. The employees and the managers were all friendly and greeted me and they were ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Good Flying J to get a parking, fuel and shower and friendly people to serve you. But there‚Äôs no hot food. I stop here many times and no hot food at all. Good thing there‚Äôs some fast food across the main street if you‚Äôre able to walk.
Old but clean enough for me. I appreciate truck stop in the middle of nowhere being able to cater to us truckers. There‚Äôs laundry facility, clean shower with good water pressure. So no complaints.

Place is a dumpster fire. I will avoid this FJ at all cost. The ladies could not help me figure out how to help a person take a shower. Pumps are uneven. Lady at the counter rolled her eyes at me. Do these people understand that we spend ‚Ä¶
Hot great shower, easy parking, cold beer, Walmart nearby.

Feels like this place is about to go under. Reserved a shower and walked in to an uncleaned shower (I do understand that the system messes up). Informed the lady on duty of the situation in the nicest way possible and she proceeded to stare ‚Ä¶
Yuck. Let hope you dont get shower 6
11/07/2024 the line for the shower hasn't moved from 8.50 p.m. to 10.10 p.m. half of the showers are available but no one cleans them

‚Ä¶ On top of great stock of snack, drinks and food the Js are outstanding in the cleanliness of their bathrooms and the shower stalls. I've never had a bad experience here and tend to try and stop at each one when I need to stop. ‚Ä¶

Dennys made this place for me. Linda our waitress was probably the best waitress we ever had. Great service! Shower had a big wad of someone's hair on the floor. It was pretty gross. Ladies bathroom was filthy at night but in am it was ‚Ä¶

What a dump, stopped in there today for a shower, hair all over cold water. Urine around base of toilet, guy swore he cleaned it all he did was take dirty towels out put clean one in, then in store no cups for fountain drinks rude tattooed ‚Ä¶

locations.content: Hixton Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I stopped for a 10 and shower. $8 for a shower. Water pressure was amazing. The 3 squares on the back are their own separate sprayers. 9/10. My only complaint is not having a fan in there for circulation. Shower 3 was clean. ‚Ä¶
This place is EXCELLENT!! Great customer service,  probably the best I've had in a long time. I took a shower there also & it was very clean.

‚Ä¶ . So was the Rum Raisin ice cream. I was offered a sample of all 8 flavors available at the time. Showers are $12. The shower I had, #4, was clean, has a bit of a view & has 3 streams in the shower that are controlled separately. It ‚Ä¶
Clean shower, and only 10 bucks! Friendly place and plenty of truck parking.  Great food!

This is a very clean truck stop. The toilets and showers are great. The showers are $8. You can experience a more luxurious shower than at major truck stops. The food at the restaurant next door was very delicious and the portions were more ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ do stop and have a look-see here. They have showers upstairs if you need a shower that have all the nozzles in the wall that is like a standing massage and it is Heavenly I'm telling you. The food is really really phenomenal and it's real ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ due to weather. We finally ordered breakfast and it was wonderful. Later that day we took showers, and OMG,best shower we have had on the road. After breakfast and showers we figured dinner was a good idea and it was!! I had a bacon ‚Ä¶
Best shower in the world. Seriously the best I've ever had. Had Polish Sausage and Sauerkraut special last night was very tasty and all I could eat. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the top of the Best truck stops across Great America. From the friendly personal at the fuel desk to the family style restaurant with great cooking...... and the showers are the BEST. Rather you just need fuel, eat or quick shower this is ‚Ä¶
Great diesel price for the state... 4/20/22 4.68/gal. Very trucker friendly also free shower plus beverage (50 gal min?) and 2 cent per gallon in store reward no card needed

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Quick stop while traveling through Wisconsin. The Osseo Family Restaurant that‚Äôs connected looked pretty good. Prices looked reasonable. Restrooms were clean. Didn‚Äôt need a shower, but what a great amenity for truck drivers and travelers.

Very nice shower facilities.  If I had to guess, I'd say the showers received a recent face-lift. Very clean and smelled good too. There were paper towels in the shower room! They also provided 2 bath-sized towels, 1 hand towel,  1 ‚Ä¶

The convenience store was nice and clean. Showers were a different story. Human waste streaks in the toilet. Curly hairs on the shower seat and the toilet lid. Hair dryer didn't work, even after resetting the ground fault. The shower door ‚Ä¶

Staff is top tier, shower freshly remodeled, and CLEAN. Food is also good. They have a good variety of snacks and fresh fruit bowls that were FRESH. It‚Äôs hard to come by a good helpful staff, and clean establishment out here in the truck ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ nothing to them at all. It is totally sad. Thank God I received a little money to take a shower and sustain it until tomorrow. Truckers and people in general in this area are not what you truly think they are!!!! A place to stay away from! ‚Ä¶
Very clean place,great stuff in the store,family restaurant(very very delicious food )big parking for semi clean shower.A+++++

‚Ä¶ Amazing home cooked food in the restaurant! Clean restrooms and I'm sure showers are nice too although we didn't use them.  Plenty of semi parking although the lot is not paved and has some potholes.  We will definitely be coming back! ‚Ä¶
Great place to stop! Friendly staff and clean facility. The food and the staff at the sit down restaurant were great. Great place for truckers to stop for a bathroom break, shower or a hot meal!
Amazing food in the restaurant! Pretty cool truck stop nice and tidy restrooms. The shower definitely needs a better cleaning procedure but wasn't "really" bad.
Store was clean and had lots of options for snacks. Shower was outdated but decently clean. The restaurant attached was good, food was great and the atmosphere was nice.

showerReviews.reviewText: Went here for my shower was Happy they are in the Pilot Network but was like  well Dang, you only get a dry off towel.. NO WASHCLOTH, NOR FOOT TOWELS.  MAKE SURE TO BRING YOUR OWN ..   Also while in the shower room getting out the shower ‚Ä¶
Forever wait for a shower cause they‚Äôre to lazy to clean one ‚Ä¶
The showerrooms up stairs are way to unbearably hot to shower in. On the other hand, the restaurant is good.
showerReviews.uniqueId: Kaleb Lippert (Saints and Angels Channel)_The_showerrooms_up_stairs_are_way_to_unbearably_ho_2 months ago

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The place has anything and everything you can ever think or wish for. Open 24/7 its the one stop shop. Truckers heaven. Bathrooms, shower, restaurant, assorted truck stickers and such. Get everything you want!!!! Ill be back!!!!!! Enjoy!!!!

First time here but this a very nice truck. People are really friendly.  Great shower nice and hot. The only fault was restaurant needs to open a little bit longer. This place beats the pilot and love truck stops. Keep up the great work. I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the service was alright. The store though? Nope. The cashiers were rude. I had purchased fuel & went back in after parking & waiting for the customer base to slow to get a shower. There are 2 of us, but we share shower rooms since it is my ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ restaurant is great. Parking is okay kind of disorganized. What really bumped them down on the stars is the early morning employees don't clean the showers and wouldn't sell me a shower when requested. He said I had to wait until 7:00 when ‚Ä¶

This place was clean, the linens were gorgeous and super comfy. The Roman shower was perfect for my needs. I was staying there because I was having a consult at the University of MN. I took 1 star off because I was surprised by the $27 ‚Ä¶

Do not take a shower here. You can't breathe because of all the chemicals. It was miserable. So many of us are chemically sensitive or allergic to things. There was no air conditioning or air circulation in th ed shower stall. We did get a ‚Ä¶
I really love this truckstop it‚Äôs really clean a lot of parking a lot of food good shower good  good customer service everything is so perfect ü§© ‚Ä¶
